title: Firefox for Android 45.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Fix a regression impacting some specific uploads ([1255735][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1255735

Fix a crash impacting the video playback with Media Source Extension ([1258562][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1258562

Fix a web compatibility regression impacting the *srcset* attribute of the *image* tag ([1259482][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1259482

Fix an issue impacting the cookie header when third-party cookies are blocked ([1257861][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1257861

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 2.3
 - Android 3.0
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
